page.title: 18SOCIETIES AND CLUBS
page.content: Around South Petherton there are lots of clubs and societies. SCOUTS is held on Friday nights at 7.30 till 9.00. There are about 20-25 scouts, they have a uniform of a beret, green shirt, dark trousers and an orange and black scarf. It is held up the Rec. GUIDES is also held on Fridays at 7.00 till 8.45. They also have a uniform of a hat, blue dress and a blue shirt. Guides is for girls over 10. CUBS is held on Monday nights for younger boys. It is 6.30 till 8.00. There are about 30 cubs. They have a uniform of a green jumper, green cap, dark trousers and an orange and black scarf. BROWNIES is on Tuesdays 5.30 till 7.00. Their uniform is a brown bobble hat, a brown dress and a little yellow tie.Girls ages 7-10,in the Blake hall.
